description: Production deployment manifest for PPV (Post-Processing and Visualization) module

notes.debug_scripts: DebugScripts folder contains PowerShell and shell scripts for development only
notes.backup_files: MCAparser_bkup.py is a backup/legacy file not needed in production
notes.installation: install_dependencies scripts are for development environment setup only
notes.configs: All three product config files (GNR, CWF, DMR) should be deployed to support multi-product scenarios

dependencies: Can be used standalone or integrated with DebugFramework
deployment_notes: PPV module can be deployed independently or as part of DebugFramework integration. When deploying with DebugFramework, ensure configs directory is accessible.
